1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Time.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Type.Time.Time
6  ( -- * Time type
7    Time (..), Zone,
8    timePrecision,
9
10    -- * Create time
11    dTime, dcTime, dczTime,
12         
13    -- * Conversion
14    timeCutClock, timeSetClock,
15    timeAltZone, timeCutZone,
16    timeLocalize,
17    timeAltDate, timeAltDays,
18    timeFromZonedTime,
19    timeDaysSec,
20
21    -- * Creation with I/O
22    nowUtc, nowZoned, now, today,
23  ) where
24
25import qualified Data.Time.Calendar                      as Tim
26import qualified Data.Time.Calendar.WeekDate             as Tim
27import qualified Data.Time.Clock                         as Tim
28import qualified Data.Time.LocalTime                     as Tim
29import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
30import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
31import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Time.Clock         as T
32import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Time.ClockCalc     as T
33import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Time.Date          as T
34import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Time.Parts         as T
35
36
37-- ----------------------  Time
38
39-- | Time is a small duration on timeline.
40data Time
41    = TimeYmdcz T.Date T.Clock Zone  -- ^ Date and clock with time zone
42    | TimeYmdc  T.Date T.Clock       -- ^ Date and clock
43    | TimeYmd   T.Date               -- ^ Year, month, and day
44    | TimeYw    T.Mjd                -- ^ Year and week
45    | TimeYm    T.Mjd                -- ^ Year and month
46      deriving (Eq, Ord)
47
48-- | Time zone as offset from UTC.
49type Zone = T.Sec
50
51-- | The first day of the Modified Julian Day.
52instance B.Default Time where
53    def = dTime $ T.mjdDate (0 :: Int)
54
55-- | Extract date part and convert to MJT.
56instance T.ToMjd Time where
57    toMjd (TimeYmdcz d _ _)   = T.toMjd d
58    toMjd (TimeYmdc  d _)     = T.toMjd d
59    toMjd (TimeYmd   d)       = T.toMjd d
60    toMjd (TimeYw    mjd)     = mjd
61    toMjd (TimeYm    mjd)     = mjd
62
63-- | Get the name of time precision.
64timePrecision :: Time -> String
65timePrecision (TimeYmdcz _ c _)  = T.clockPrecision c ++ " zone"
66timePrecision (TimeYmdc  _ c)    = T.clockPrecision c
67timePrecision (TimeYmd   d)      = T.datePrecision d
68timePrecision (TimeYw    _)      = "week"
69timePrecision (TimeYm    _)      = "month"
70
71
72-- ----------------------  Encode
73
74instance Show Time where
75    show = B.mixToFlatString . B.mixEncode
76
77instance B.MixEncode Time where
78    mixEncode = timeToMix
79
80timeToMix :: Time -> B.MixText
81timeToMix time =
82    case time of
83      TimeYmdcz d c z  -> dcz d c z `B.mixSep` szone z
84      TimeYmdc  d c    -> dc d c
85      TimeYmd   d      -> B.mixEncode d
86      TimeYw    day    -> yw $ Tim.toWeekDate  day
87      TimeYm    day    -> ym $ Tim.toGregorian day
88    where
89      dcz               :: T.Date -> T.Clock -> Zone -> B.MixText
90      dcz d c z         = let c'       = T.clockAddSec z c
91                              (day, _) = T.clockDaysSec c'
92                          in dc (T.dateAddDay day d) (T.clockCutDay c')
93
94      dc                :: T.Date -> T.Clock -> B.MixText
95      dc d c            = B.mixEncode d `B.mixSep` T.clockBodyToMix c
96
97      zone z            = hm $ T.dhmsFromSec z
98      szone z           = case z `compare` 0 of
99                            EQ -> B.mixString "UTC"
100                            LT -> B.mixString "-" O.++ zone z
101                            GT -> B.mixString "+" O.++ zone z
102
103      hm (_, h, m, _)   = B.mixJoin ":"  [T.mix02 h, T.mix02 m]
104      yw (y, w, _)      = B.mixJoin "-#" [B.mixDec y, B.mixDec w]
105      ym (y, m, _)      = B.mixJoin "-"  [B.mixDec y, T.mix02 m]
106
107
108-- ----------------------  Creation
109
110-- | Create time without clock.
111--
112--   >>> dTime $ T.mjdDate (55555 :: Int)
113--   2010-12-25
114--
115--   >>> dTime $ T.ymdDateClip 2013 4 31
116--   2013-04-30
117--
118--   >>> dTime <$> T.ymdDate 2013 4 18
119--   Right 2013-04-18
120--
121dTime :: T.Date -> Time
122dTime = TimeYmd
123
124-- | Create time with clock.
125--
126--   >>> dcTime (T.mjdDate (55555 :: Int)) (T.ClockPartsMin 0 10 40)
127--   2010-12-25 10 40
128--
129--   >>> dcTime (T.mjdDate (55555 :: Int)) (T.ClockPartsMin 1 10 40)
130--   2010-12-26 10:40
131--
132dcTime :: (T.ToClock clock) => T.Date -> clock -> Time
133dcTime d c = dcTime2 d $ T.toClock c
134
135dcTime2 :: T.Date -> T.Clock -> Time
136dcTime2 d c = let (d', c') = T.clockDaysClock c
137              in TimeYmdc (T.dateAddDay d' d) c'
138
139-- | Create time from date, clock, and time zone.
140dczTime :: T.Date -> T.Clock -> Zone -> Time
141dczTime d c z = let (d', c') = T.clockDaysClock c
142                 in TimeYmdcz (T.dateAddDay d' d) c' z
143
144
145-- ----------------------  Construction with I/O
146
147-- | Get UTC.
148--
149--   >>> nowUtc
150--   2013-04-18 08:37:36 UTC
151--
152nowUtc :: IO Time
153nowUtc = do time <- Tim.getZonedTime
154            let time' = time { Tim.zonedTimeZone = Tim.utc }
155            return $ timeFromZonedTime time'
156
157-- | Get current time with time zone.
158--
159--   >>> nowZoned
160--   2013-04-18 17:37:36 +09:00
161--
162nowZoned :: IO Time
163nowZoned = do time <- Tim.getZonedTime
164              return $ timeFromZonedTime time
165
166-- | Get current local time without time zone.
167--
168--   >>> now
169--   2013-04-18 17:37:36
170--
171now :: IO Time
172now = do time <- Tim.getZonedTime
173         return $ timeLocalize $ timeFromZonedTime time
174
175-- | Get today.
176--
177--   >>> today
178--   2013-04-18
179--
180today :: IO Time
181today = do time <- now
182           return $ timeCutClock time
183
184
185-- ----------------------  Conversion
186
187-- | Cut timezone.
188timeCutZone :: O.Map Time
189timeCutZone (TimeYmdcz d c _)    = dcTime2 d c
190timeCutZone time                 = time
191
192-- | Cut timezone and convert to local time,
193--   i.e., addition of UTC and time zone.
194timeLocalize :: O.Map Time
195timeLocalize (TimeYmdcz d c z)   = dcTime2 d $ T.clockAddSec z c
196timeLocalize time                = time
197
198-- | Alter time zone part.
199timeAltZone :: O.Map Zone -> O.Map Time
200timeAltZone f (TimeYmdcz d c z)   = dczTime d c $ f z
201timeAltZone _ time                = time
202
203-- | Cut clock part.
204timeCutClock :: O.Map Time
205timeCutClock (TimeYmdcz d _ _)    = TimeYmd d
206timeCutClock (TimeYmdc  d _)      = TimeYmd d
207timeCutClock time                 = time
208
209-- | Set or add clock to time.
210timeSetClock :: T.Clock -> O.Map Time
211timeSetClock c (TimeYmdcz d _ z)  = TimeYmdcz d c z
212timeSetClock c (TimeYmdc  d _)    = TimeYmdc  d c
213timeSetClock c (TimeYmd   d)      = TimeYmdc  d c
214timeSetClock _ time               = time
215
216-- | Alter day part.
217timeAltDate :: O.Map T.Date -> O.Map Time
218timeAltDate f (TimeYmdcz d c z)  = TimeYmdcz (f d) c z
219timeAltDate f (TimeYmdc  d c)    = TimeYmdc  (f d) c
220timeAltDate f (TimeYmd   d)      = TimeYmd   (f d)
221timeAltDate _ (TimeYw    d)      = TimeYw    d
222timeAltDate _ (TimeYm    d)      = TimeYm    d
223
224-- | Alter the Modified Julian Day of date part.
225timeAltMjd :: O.Map T.Mjd -> O.Map Time
226timeAltMjd f (TimeYmdcz d c z)   = TimeYmdcz (T.dateAltMjd f d) c z
227timeAltMjd f (TimeYmdc  d c)     = TimeYmdc  (T.dateAltMjd f d) c
228timeAltMjd f (TimeYmd   d)       = TimeYmd   (T.dateAltMjd f d)
229timeAltMjd f (TimeYw    d)       = TimeYw    (f d)
230timeAltMjd f (TimeYm    d)       = TimeYm    (f d)
231
232-- | Alter integer content of the Modified Julian Day.
233timeAltDays :: O.Map T.Days -> O.Map Time
234timeAltDays f time = timeAltMjd g time where
235    g (Tim.ModifiedJulianDay d) = Tim.ModifiedJulianDay $ f d
236
237-- | Convert local time to Koshu time content.
238timeFromZonedTime :: Tim.ZonedTime -> Time
239timeFromZonedTime zt = time where
240    Tim.UTCTime mjd s = Tim.zonedTimeToUTC zt
241    d    = T.mjdDate $ Tim.toModifiedJulianDay mjd
242    c    = T.clockFromDhms 0 0 0 $ floor s
243    time = TimeYmdcz d c (60 * Tim.timeZoneMinutes (Tim.zonedTimeZone zt))
244
245-- | Days and seconds of time.
246--
247--   >>> timeDaysSec $ dTime $ T.mjdDate (55555 :: Int)
248--   (55555,0)
249--
250timeDaysSec :: Time -> T.DaysSec
251timeDaysSec (TimeYmdcz d c _)  = dateClockDaysSec d c
252timeDaysSec (TimeYmdc d c)     = dateClockDaysSec d c
253timeDaysSec (TimeYmd d)        = (T.mjdInteger $ T.toMjd d, 0)
254timeDaysSec (TimeYw d)         = (T.mjdInteger d, 0)
255timeDaysSec (TimeYm d)         = (T.mjdInteger d, 0)
256
257dateClockDaysSec :: T.Date -> T.Clock -> T.DaysSec
258dateClockDaysSec d c = let (d', s) = T.clockDaysSec c
259                       in (T.mjdInteger (T.toMjd d) + d', s)
